basic.description: This course studies the molecular basis of cellular function with emphasis on the activities of DNA, RNA, and the regulation of gene expression.
basic.subject: PCB
basic.title: Molecular Biology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, and CHM 1046L; PCB 3063 and PCB 3134 recommended.
